page.title: 13FARMING
page.content: We visited some farms on our grid area.Others we sent qustionaires to via Mr Talbot(milk tanker driver)The visited farms did not have dairy herds.{EAST CHASE FARM Owner Mr.Weetman 200 acres 100 livestock and starting free range poultry sceme.{FARM HOUSE has been sold.It dates from 1640 and has been divided betwen 2 families the CURLEYS and GREGORY.They are not farmers but have approx-2 acres for horses.{CHESTERTON FARM}Owner B.V. SAUNDERS.123 acres.68 dairy cows+30 followers 40 beef cattle.Arable Silage barley.Sells at Banbury/Stratford Mkts Milk to Unigate.{BURTON GREEN FARM} Owner Mr.Smith.50 acres(20 hctrs.) 25 Dairy cows/40 sheep.Silage/hay sells Rugby mkt.Milk to Unigate.{ {LONG MEADOW BARN FARM}F.GROVES Owner 25 dairy cows.Arable all grass.(p.20)
